content: I couldn't agree more. peter quill's tough exterior and cocky attitude can sometimes make him come across as arrogant, but his vulnerability and softer side make him a relatable and likable character. he has been through a lot of trauma and pain in his life, and this has left him with emotional scars. these scars serve as a reminder that deep down, he is still just a human (even if he is an intergalactic one), and he is capable of feeling hurt and vulnerable. this vulnerability makes him feel more real and relatable, and it helps us to empathize with his struggles and root for him as he navigates the challenges of being star-lord.
